message:
Tell Microsoft about the non-Microsoft libraries and frameworks you want them to support best. They created this because they want to listen :)

RT @JMatthiesen: Are you a web developer? We want to hear about the libraries and frameworks you're using!
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
